articles.title: MATCH RECAP: Inter Miami CF Earns 2-0 Win Over Real Salt Lake in 2024 MLS Home Opener - Inter Miami CF
articles.description: Inter Miami CF earned a 2-0 over Real Salt Lake at Chase Stadium on Wednesday evening in the team’s 2024 MLS home opener. The team’s first match of the 2024 regular season saw attacker Robert Taylor and midfielder Diego Gómez get on the scoresheet, while capt…

articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: 'The whole of India misses Mahi bhai a lot': Shubman Gill pays tribute to MS Dhoni ahead of Ranchi Test - The Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: India batter Shubman Gill acknowledges the influence of legendary cricketer MS Dhoni and highlights the nation's enduring fondness for the former captain. Gill's tribute to Dhoni resonates widely among fans.
